sentence.idiomatic: The company is taking this promotional event very seriously.
Does this school value students' innovative abilities?
He didn't really take the needs of his customers very seriously, and consequently, he failed.
Faced with criticism, he didn't immediately give his opinion.
Today the president will give a speech to the whole nation on television.
Everyone can express their point of view freely on this matter.
This is the agenda for this meeting.
According to the agenda, starting this month this kind of product must be withdrawn from the market.
Only the last thing on this event's agenda has not been completed.
The students, in order of age from the youngest to the oldest, all got a gift from the principal.
The host introduced the stars who were present in order from left to right.
Today everyone need not take turns speaking. You can express your opinions freely.
Through analysis, we have discerned the reason for the failure this time.
I know how to choose, after listening to the expert's analysis.
You must carefully analyze yourself whether or not studying overseas would be beneficial.
He is in charge of promoting this website in Hong Kong.
A good product also needs to be promoted. This is the only way it will sell well.
Attending an international conference would help to popularize this new technique quickly.
How are the sales of this product?
Winter clothing sales will definitely be pretty good next month.
He is in charge of automobile sales.
This excellent movie was created by them collectively.
We went mountain climbing together on the weekend.
We went as a group to cheer for the Chinese team at that competition.
Hello everyone, let’s start the meeting now. First I’ll invite Mr. Li to brief us on today’s agenda.
Good afternoon, colleagues. At today’s meeting we need to discuss three issues. In order, they are: market analysis, marketing, and sales.
That’s right. The managers of the Marketing Department and Sales Department will brief us on their plans. Then, there will be a group discussion and question and answer period.
Right, today’s meeting is extremely important. So I invite everyone to express their point of view actively.
Mr. Li is right. After the meeting concludes, I would ask that each colleague write a summary report. The company really values your input. All right, now let’s proceed according to our agenda.
